divs: Sighting DetailsI saw when i was young about ten turning,eleven im 30 now, me my father went to pick up my mother from work with my younger brother and sister my father parked the car near the fence near bridge the only light was a florecent light a top of the door on the building itself so enough light that we were'nt scared to get out at that time, we waited in car for my mom, my father fell asleep so me and my brother and sister step outside and did what kids do started playing, but since it was a dark lot near a railroad track and bridge so it covered alot of the glare that city lights emit so you could see the stars perfect so as we where looking up a triangle shaped craft came into view moving very slow i told my little brother to look up and also my little sister i thought it might've been some sort of plane and my eyes stayed glued to i just made me feel excited and scared i tried to figure out what it was, it had a white lights on all three edges and a red colored one in the middle and it had like a writing on it like outlining the lights it kept bothering me all this years my kid brother and sis cant seem to remember that well, i saw a u.f.o show where they showed a triangle shape one not to long ago and when they show it it send chills down my spine and i felt scared and it like brought me back to that point and i got a good enough glimpse of it to remember it but it wasnt black it was more like a gunmetal dark copper. I tell people about it and they laugh but thats the way it happened never saw anything like it again but it bothers me so much that I had to tell someone who might not find it so outrageous the location was of plain st in lowell mass by a factory that used to make plastic holders for vegetables and others things and traveling east to west i kept looking at it until it dissapered behind the tree line well i know its been a long time but just wanted to share my experience and thats what i remember well thanks for listening
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Chelmsford
There were no other sightings in Chelmsford on or around October 10th 1989
